content: free pattern amigurumi hedgehog by yarns and nobles materials used for head and feet any cream colored worsted weight yarn for body - premiere just yarn pink is dream chenille brown is plush sold at dollar tree safety eyes 5 mm or you can embroider eyes nose small amount of black yarn size 4 hook you can go up on hook size when using chenille or plush yarn for a plumper body abbreviations *special instructions for the feet single_crochet single_crochet i used a small bobble stitch instead of doing yarn mc magic_ring over and pull up a loop five times i only did it three increase increase decrease decrease cc change color make time under an hour 1 using cream yarn 6sc into a mc 6 2 2sc increase x2 8 3 7sc increase 9 4 2sc increase x3 12 5 increase in each of the next 3 st 9sc 15 6 increase in each of the next 6 st 9sc 21 7 6sc increase x2 cc to body color 6sc increase 24 8 17sc cc to cream bobble stitch* cc to body color 2sc cc to cream bobble stitch* cc to body color 3sc 24 9-12 24 single_crochet 24 13 18 single_crochet cc to cream bobble stitch* cc to body color 3sc cc to cream bobble stitch* cc to body 1sc 24 you may need to adjust the placement of the feet by 1 or 2 stitches to make them align properly finish off with cream color and secure yarn if using safety eyes place between row 5-6 about 4-5 stitches apart begin stuffing and stuff as you go 14 2sc decrease x6 18 15 1sc decrease x6 12 16 2sc decrease x3 9 finish off leaving a long tail if needed you can use yarn tail to cover/hide any cream stitches left over from the color change while making the feet secure yarn and hide yarn tail in body embroider nose using black yarn i started in the center of the magic_ring and went into stitches in between round 1 and 2 i only did my nose one stitch wide i hope you enjoy this pattern i would love to see your finished projects this is only my second pattern release i hope to do more in the future @yarns_n_nobles
